package.name: osm_path_planner
package.description: Tools for path planning based on OSM (OpenStreetMap) and traversability point-cloud. Includes visualisation tools.
package.author: Adam Herold
Martin Pecka
Jan Vlk
package.build_depends:
message_generation
message_runtime
compass cras_py_common geometry_msgs llh_gnss_driver nav_msgs nav_utils nodelet ros_numpy rospkg rospy rostopic sensor_msgs stamped_msgs std_msgs topic_tools tf tf2_py tf2_ros visualization_msgs
